input.sentences: a couple decides to try a new fancy restaurant .
the woman is very impressed and hopes they will come back again .
the outside of the restaurant is ready for a celebration .
the street is illuminated in a glowing pink and yellow .
the man is in awe at the restaurants interesting decorations .
output.sentences: My wife and I decided to go to a fancy restaurant downtown.
This woman, my wife that is, always has the highest hopes and expectations from where we visit but she was very impressed.
As we entered, it seemed as if the restaurant was ready for some kind of a large celebration.
The decor in the restaurant was yellow but they had pink-colored spotlights shining bright into the street outside.
We had such a wonderful experience and simply in such awe over the decorations that this restaurant has been, by far, the most pleasant out of all of the restaurants that we've ever visited.
